WebLink.description: Button allows the pre-select of docusign templates to send the clients. Templates are: 6659b0c6-7998-4967-a8ca-988d6c860d35 = Gen Svcs c01d90ba-c74e-4c6a-bccf-a13562053daf = Informed Consent (donate) 7cf01d49-3ef9-4818-9f13-e7b93f35c110 = BioServices (donate) d777f83c-9770-4784-ae2b-05556a0477ed = Healthcare Team 69c08822-56cc-4e8e-9ba2-1cbef2abc440 = MHQ aca8d278-9970-4f43-ad23-3d8d9f4080c1 = Medical Records Request
